title: Best of The Herd for Jul 16, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 16, 2020
description:
Dak Prescott messed up trying to get everything he could

Derrick Henry's contract is fair because he isn't a top 3 RB

Don't judge Myles Garrett on just one incident

Dak to the Colts in a year makes a lot of sense


Guests: Mike Fisher, Cowboys Reporter

Rob Parker, FOX Sports Radio & FS1 Contributor

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
